title: Google creates ‘Chromebook repair program’ for schools as education usage hits 50 million
content:
Google announced today that 50 million students and educators now use Chromebooks, and that it’s going to help schools find information about how to fix their devices with a new repair program site.

more…

The post Google creates ‘Chromebook repair program’ for schools as education usage hits 50 million  appeared first on 9to5Google.
